<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Iron Medallion](/Equipment.aspx?ID=221)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 568 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 175 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You attempt a Will save against a fear effect but haven't rolled yet

**Requirement** You have master proficiency in Will saves or have the bravery class feature
</row>

</column>

---

This small medallion is shaped like a shield. When you activate it, you gain a +2 status bonus to saves against fear for 1 minute. On the triggering save, if the outcome of your roll is a failure, you get a success instead or if the outcome is a critical failure, you get a failure instead. 

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
